oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Management of potato late blight (Phytophthora infestans) in organic potato production
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hannukkala, A.
Lehtinen, A.
Avikainen, H.
Huhta, H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aim of this study is to define factors of success and failure in disease management in organic potato production and test efficacy of cultural crop management practises including row spacing and mechanical defoliation to suppress the progress of potato late blight epidemics.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Hannukkala, A.; Lehtinen, A.; Avikainen, H. and Huhta, H. (2004) Management of potato late blight (Phytophthora infestans) in organic potato production. Paper at: The International school-conference plant cultivation in the European North, Petroskoi, November 24-26, 2004.
